Html: I know this may sound like a stupid question, so bear with me but does anyone know what the mac string value is suppose to be? In the sample app it is "52544131303235572D454137443638"  Is it the mac address for the PC, for the router or is it the mac address for the  wireless adapter in the pc? I have tried all of these and I still get an exception
Nevermind I figured it out It was suppose to be the SSID in hex
